cause.description:
Dr. Ron Paul is a committed defender of free-markets, property rights, a non-interventionist foreign policy, civil liberties and a limited government. Ron Paul is the only Republican primary candidate to have voted against the Iraq war resolution and the PATRIOT Act. Ron Paul will restore our federal government to its rightful, constitutionally-limited role. America needs a President who will lead this country back to its founding principles, which have stood as a bulwark against government tyranny for generations. That man is Ron Paul.

8. Ron votes against the United Nations.
9. Ron votes against the welfare state.
10. Ron votes against reinstating a military draft.
11. Ron votes for conservative principles.
12. Ron votes to cut government spending.
13. Ron votes to lower health care costs.
14. Ron votes to end the war on drugs.
15. Ron votes to preserve civil liberties.
16. Ron votes to secure our borders with real immigration reform.
17. Ron votes to eliminate tax funded abortions
18. Ron votes to protect religious freedom.
